opinions.snippet:
PAUL H. ANDERSON, J.
(dissenting).
I respectfully dissent. In its effort to reach a correct policy decision, the majority disregards our proper role as interpreters of the law. In doing so, the majority has preempted the legislature’s function and assumed the mantle of policymaker.
